BBK01.BQ1833: Central, state and local government debt - loans from other non-banks

General: For Germany as a whole (excluding hospitals with commercial accounting practices) From September 2009, including the debt of the Investment and Repayment Fund plus the Financial Market Stabilisation Fund (SoFFin).
Comment on 2009-07: From September 2009, including the debt of the Investment and Repayment Fund plus the Financial Market Stabilisation Fund (SoFFin).
